member.name: M:WebApplication1.Controllers.KostylProvider.PatchPath(Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.ApiExplorer.ApiDescription,System.String)
member.summary: Add #method to JsonRpc urls to make them different for swagger

member.name: M:WebApplication1.Controllers.KostylProvider.PatchParams(Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.ApiExplorer.ApiDescription,Tochka.JsonRpc.Server.Models.MethodMetadata,System.String)
member.summary: Hide separate JsonRpc-bound parameters and wrap them into Request`T. T is emitted dynamically to allow swagger schema generation

member.name: M:WebApplication1.Controllers.KostylProvider.PatchResponseTypes(Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.ApiExplorer.ApiDescription)
member.summary: Wrap action response type into Response`T, set content-type as application/json and HTTP code 200

member.name: P:WebApplication1.Controllers.KostylProvider.Order
member.summary: Arbitrary number greater than -1000 in DefaultApiDescriptionProvider

member.name: T:WebApplication1.Controllers.ModelTypeEmitter
member.summary: Creates types for proper schema generation. See https://jonathancrozier.com/blog/time-to-reflect-how-to-add-properties-to-a-c-sharp-object-dynamically-at-runtime
